p: Tchesnokov et al. ( 2019) declared that the significant inhibition of Ebola virus RNA polymerase can be attributed to the anti-viral effect of RDV. Brown et al. ( 2019) also reported that RDV stimulate its anti-viral effects through inhibition of RNA polymerase in human CoV OC43 (HCoV-OC43) ( Figure 3(i–vi)).
